description: The Hidropon√≠a Sotelo initiative, led by an engineer in Peru, addresses food security challenges through hydroponics. This innovative project utilizes a nutrient solution in controlled environments to grow high-quality vegetables while conserving water and soil. Despite being in the research phase for two years, the team aims to scale up production and establish partnerships for funding and expertise, focusing on sustainable agricultural practices and technological advancements in plant monitoring.
name: Hidroponia Sotelo
